name: Amoeba Blast
description:
Amoeba blast is a game for the 50th Ludum Dare compo. 

Play as a triangular Amoeba that can shoot water at enemies using its contractile vacuole. 

The theme was "Delay the Inevitable". In this game, you can delay shooting enemies in order to grow bigger, thus being able to shoot bigger bullets!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Left click/Space to shoot

That's all there is to it!
